segments.text: yes , I just adopted her from the humane society this weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's good of you . why did you decide to get a rabbit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , i wanted to get a pet that wouldn't disturb the neighbors . at the same time , I wanted a pet that would be affectionate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: rabbits aren't usually that affectionate , are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: if you cuddle them a lot when they are very young , they can be just as affectionate as dogs or cats .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: i didn't know that . Are rabbits difficult to take care of ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: not really . I went to the veterinarian to get her vaccinated and she told me that all I needed to do was to make sure to trim its nails from time to time , to give her food and water , and to clean its
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that sounds pretty easy . Do rabbits make your house smell ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , rabbits aren't very stinky . As long as your clean the cage on a regular basis , it's not too bad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: can you train a rabbit to do things ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you can't train them like you can train dogs , but you can train them to do some things . For example , you can train them to go the bathroom in a special rabbit toilet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's amazing ! Has she bitten you yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: not yet . She's pretty tame . I think she must be used to being around lots of different people .
segments.speaker: S2
